id: House GOP Campaign Head Denounces Fellow Republican for ‘Hate’ Comments
paragraph:
November 16, 2018In an extraordinary rebuke of a fellow Republican member of Congress, Steve Stivers (R., Ohio), the head of the House GOP’s campaign arm, condemned comments by Rep. Steve King (R., Iowa) Tuesday and accused him of trafficking in “white supremacy.”“Congressman Steve King’s recent comments, actions, and retweets are completely inappropriate,” Mr. Stivers, the chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, wrote on Twitter. “We must stand up against white supremacy and hate in all forms, and I strongly condemn...
